name: Splunk_Search_Mail_Subject
author: Unit777, LetMeR00t
description: Execute a savedsearch on a Splunk instance with a mail subject as argument

configurationItems.name: password
configurationItems.description: User password of the previous mentionned account

configurationItems.name: application
configurationItems.description: Spunk application in which the saved searches are stored

configurationItems.name: owner
configurationItems.description: Username that corresponds to the owner of the saved searches

configurationItems.name: saved_searches
configurationItems.description: Name of the saved searches to use

configurationItems.name: earliest_time
configurationItems.description: If not empty, this will set the earliest time of the searches

configurationItems.name: latest_time
configurationItems.description: If not empty, this will set the latest time of the searches

configurationItems.name: max_count
configurationItems.description: Maximum number of results to return for a search
